A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I've been trying to think of a simple way to sum up how I feel about Star Wars: The Last Jedi and the best I've come up with is simply this: Star Wars: The Last Jedi\, to me\, is like finding out all the members of your favourite band have died (Luke\, Han and Leia) but they're still going to carry on with the drummer (Chewbacca) and a trio of fresh talent (Rey\, Finn\, Poe) who you like\, but it's just not your band anymore.
